A

addAll(String[], String) - Method in interface ie.gmit.dip.APIWordParser
Loops over the array and maps each key word to the value passed in by the paramater googleWord and adds them to the TreeMap wordMap
addAll(String[], String) - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.WordParser
Loops over the array and maps each key word to the value passed in by the paramater googleWord and adds them to the TreeMap wordMap
APIWordParser - Interface in ie.gmit.dip
The interface APIWordParser is an abstraction of a word parser that is used to map keys to values for use with a text simplifier application.

C

colour() - Method in enum ie.gmit.dip.ConsoleColour
 
ConsoleColour - Enum in ie.gmit.dip
An enum containing ANSI escape codes used for colouring monitors.

G

getGoogleWord(String) - Method in interface ie.gmit.dip.APIWordParser
Returns the String value mapped to the key word passed in as a parameter, if wordMap contains the key, otherwise it returns the word to lower case
getGoogleWord(String) - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.WordParser
Returns the String value mapped to the key word passed in as a parameter, if wordMap contains the key, otherwise it returns the word to lower case

I

ie.gmit.dip - package ie.gmit.dip
 
Input - Class in ie.gmit.dip
A class that outputs the Text Simplifier GUI and allows the user to input text via a Scanner.
Input() - Constructor for class ie.gmit.dip.Input
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class ie.gmit.dip.Runner
An Input object is instantiated and used to call the start method from the Input class which launches the application.
mapGoogleWord() - Method in interface ie.gmit.dip.APIWordParser
Uses a BufferedReader to read lines from a file containing a list of Google's 1000 most commonly used words in English, maps these 1000 words as key/value pairs in a TreeMap wordMap, converts them to lower case, adds them to a TreeSet wordSet then calls the mapThesaurus method.
mapGoogleWord() - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.WordParser
Uses a BufferedReader to read lines from a file containing a list of Google's 1000 most commonly used words in English, maps these 1000 words as key/value pairs in a TreeMap wordMap, converts them to lower case, adds them to a TreeSet wordSet then calls the mapThesaurus method.
mapThesaurus() - Method in interface ie.gmit.dip.APIWordParser
Uses a BufferedReader to read lines from a file containing a thesaurus, where each line contains a set of words delimited by commas, and creates a String array of words words for each line.
mapThesaurus() - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.WordParser
Uses a BufferedReader to read lines from a file containing a thesaurus, where each line contains a set of words delimited by commas, and creates a String array of words words for each line.

R

Runner - Class in ie.gmit.dip
A class containing the main method, used to launch the application
Runner() - Constructor for class ie.gmit.dip.Runner
 

S

start() - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.Input
Outputs the GUI to the terminal window and allows the user to input text via a Scanner object s instantiated inside the class.

W

WordParser - Class in ie.gmit.dip
